title: Ask the Ref with Mark Clattenburg
description:
Mark Clattenburg breaks down all of the controversial calls from this weekend's action, including whether or not Manchester United's goal should have been disallowed for handball. Plus, Man United's transfer strategy is analyzed as they come closer to signing Adrien Rabiot, and the crew take a deep dive on Atletico Madrid ahead of the start of the LaLiga season.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Clattenburg breaks down the weekend's controversial refereeing decisions; Man United close to signing Rabiot; Can Atletico Madrid make some noise this La Liga season?

Plus, Man United's transfer strategy is analyzed as they come closer to signing Adrien Rabiot, and the crew take a deep dive on Atletico Madrid ahead of the start of the LaLiga season.
